column1: Décines-Charpieu is a commune in the Metropolis of Lyon in Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region in eastern France. The name of the city is often shortened and simply called Décines.
Décines is located near Grand Large reservoir
column2: and Lyon is located 12 kilometres west.

column1: Décines left the department of Isère to join the department of Rhône in 1968
column2: and became a member of the Communauté urbaine de Lyon in 1969. On 1 January 2015 Décines left the department of Rhône to join the Metropolis of Lyon.
